content:
TITLE: Creating ClusterRoleBinding for Service Account
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a cluster role binding that associates permissions with a service account.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
kubectl create clusterrolebinding <binding_name> --clusterrole <role_name> --serviceaccount <namespace>:<service_account>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Bearer Token for Service Account
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a bearer token for service account authentication with 24-hour validity.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
kubectl create token sveltos --duration=24h
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Service Account for Authentication
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a service account in a specified namespace for authentication purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
kubectl create sa <user> -n <namespace>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying Kubernetes Resources Response Example
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /resources endpoint showing deployed Kubernetes resources in a cluster.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "totalResources": 2,
  "resources": [
    {
      "name": "nginx",
      "group": "",
      "kind": "Namespace",
      "version": "v1",
      "lastAppliedTime": "2024-04-28T13:52:26Z",
      "profileNames": [
        "ClusterProfile/deploy-resources"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying ClusterAPI Clusters Response Example
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /capiclusters endpoint showing a filtered ClusterAPI cluster with its metadata and status information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "totalClusters": 1,
  "managedClusters": [
    {
      "namespace": "default",
      "name": "clusterapi-workload",
      "clusterInfo": {
        "labels": {
          "cluster.x-k8s.io/cluster-name": "clusterapi-workload",
          "env": "fv",
          "topology.cluster.x-k8s.io/owned": ""
        },
        "version": "v1.27.0",
        "ready": true,
        "failureMessage": null
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying SveltosClusters Response Example
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /sveltosclusters endpoint showing a filtered SveltosCluster with its metadata and status information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "totalClusters": 1,
  "managedClusters": [
    {
      "namespace": "mgmt",
      "name": "mgmt",
      "clusterInfo": {
        "labels": null,
        "version": "v1.29.0",
        "ready": true,
        "failureMessage": null
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying Helm Releases Response Example
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response from the /helmcharts endpoint showing deployed Helm releases in a cluster with their metadata and status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "totalHelmReleases": 4,
  "helmReleases": [
    {
      "repoURL": "https://prometheus-community.github.io/helm-charts",
      "releaseName": "prometheus",
      "namespace": "prometheus",
      "chartVersion": "23.4.0",
      "icon": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prometheus/prometheus.github.io/master/assets/prometheus_logo-cb55bb5c346.png",
      "lastAppliedTime": "2024-04-28T13:49:29Z",
      "profileName": "ClusterProfile/prometheus-grafana"
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving Profile Instance Response Structure
DESCRIPTION: Example YAML structure showing the response format for a profile instance query. Includes cluster matching details, specifications, and feature status summaries.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
matchingClusters:
- cluster:
    kind: Cluster
    namespace: default
    name: clusterapi-workload
    apiVersion: cluster.x-k8s.io/v1beta1
  clusterFeatureSummaries:
  - featureID: Resources
    status: Provisioned
  - featureID: Helm
    status: FailedNonRetriable
    failureMessage: 'cannot manage chart kyverno/kyverno-latest. ClusterSummary deploy-kyverno-capi-clusterapi-workload
      managing it.'
spec:
  clusterSelector:
    matchLabels:
      env: fv
  syncMode: Continuous
  tier: 100
  stopMatchingBehavior: WithdrawPolicies
  dependsOn:
  - deploy-kyverno
  policyRefs:
  - namespace: default
    name: disallow-latest-tag
    kind: ConfigMap
    deploymentType: Remote
  - namespace: default
    name: disallow-empty-ingress
    kind: ConfigMap
    deploymentType: Remote
  helmCharts:
  - repositoryURL: https://kyverno.github.io/kyverno/
    repositoryName: kyverno
    chartName: kyverno/kyverno
    chartVersion: v3.2.6
    releaseName: kyverno-latest
    releaseNamespace: kyverno
    helmChartAction: Install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Querying Profiles Response Example
DESCRIPTION: Example YAML response from the /profiles endpoint showing profile configurations grouped by tier with dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/projectsveltos/ui-backend/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
'100':
  totalProfiles: 4
  profiles:
  - kind: ClusterProfile
    namespace: ''
    name: deploy-kyverno
    dependencies: []
    dependents:
    - kind: ClusterProfile
      name: prometheus-grafana
      apiVersion: config.projectsveltos.io/v1beta1
```

----------------------------------------

```

```

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
